PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2008-05482008-03-11,  ,  ,  ,  ND, 
ActNational Defence Act
PrecisAmendments respecting chapter 101 of the QUEEN'S REGULATIONS AND ORDERS FOR THE CANADIAN FORCES by replacing various articles relating to the reappointment of military judges, which were stucks down for not complying with subsection 11(d) of the Canadian Charter of Rights and Freedoms, which sets out the right of all accused to a trial before an independent and impartial tribunal.
